translations.Communication to the privacyIDEA server: Communication to the privacyIDEA server succeeded. The user was successfully authenticated.
Communication to the privacyIDEA server succeeded. However, the user failed to authenticate.
translations.The service account credentials are corr: The service account credentials are correct!
translations.But we recommend to update your privacyI: But we recommend to update your privacyIDEA server.
translations.Check if service account has correct per: Check if service account has correct permissions
translations.Failed to fetch authentication token. Wr: Failed to fetch authentication token. Wrong HTTP return code:
translations.Check this, to activate polling for a pu: Check this, to activate polling for a push token confirmation right from your browser.
translations.\n In a second step of au:
In a second step of authentication, the user is asked to provide a one
                time password. The users devices are managed in privacyIDEA. The
                authentication request is forwarded to privacyIDEA.
translations.Activate two factor authentication with: Activate two factor authentication with privacyIDEA
translations.\n Before act:
Before activating two factor authentication with privacyIDEA, please asure, that the connection to
                            your privacyIDEA-server is configured correctly.
translations.\n Please use:
Please use the base URL of your privacyIDEA instance.
                            For compatibility reasons, you may also specify the URL of the /validate/check endpoint.
translations.\n Sets timeo: Sets timeout to privacyIDEA for login in seconds.
translations.\n\t\t If include is: If include is selected, just the groups in this field need to do 2FA.
translations.\n\t\t If you select: If you select exclude, these groups can use 1FA (all others need 2FA).
translations.\n\t\t You can either: You can either add single IPs like 10.0.1.12,10.0.1.13, a range like 10.0.1.12-10.0.1.113 or combinations like 10.0.1.12-10.0.1.113,192.168.0.15
translations.\n Select the user re: Select the user realm, if it is not the default one.
translations.\n Do not uncheck: Do not uncheck this in productive environments!
translations.Test authentication by supplying usernam: Test the authentication by supplying username and password that should be checked against the privacyIDEA:
translations.Trigger challenges for challenge-respons: Trigger challenges for challenge-response tokens. Check this if you employ, e.g., SMS or E-Mail tokens.
translations.Let the user log in if the user is not f: Let the user log in if the user is not found in privacyIDEA.
translations.If you want to turn on the form-auto-sub:
If you want to turn on the form-auto-submit function after x number of characters 
                are entered into the OTP input field, set the expected OTP length here. 
                Note: Only digits as the parameter\'s value allowed here.
